```{r}
extract_match_data <- function(link) {
  check <<- link
  link_id = gsub(".*-", "", link) %>%
    gsub("\\/", "", .)
  read <- read_html(link)
  
  basic_data <- get_basic_data(read) %>%
    mutate(link = link,
          id = link_id)
}
```
